fields.description:
As reported by Rick Kilgore on mailing list
I need to make a couple modifications to KafkaSpout for our needs and I’m planning to submit back a PR to the main repo.  But I can’t build.  I’ve installed the latest git, java 7, and mvn 3 via apt-get onto Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.  Then I run:

git clone 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-storm' storm
cd storm
mvn clean install

I get lots of exceptions, but I think most are expected as part of the tests.   Below is the output at the end that I’m guessing is not good.  I’ve also tried this on a Mac running Mavericks and on an Amazon Linux installation.  I’ve tried in my usual shell setup, and with a stripped down bash setup with a minimal PATH.  The results are mostly the same, but regardless always fails in some way.  This is with what’s in master now, without any changes by me.  Here is the tail end of my output from mvn install:

187855 [Thread-287] INFO  backtype.storm.daemon.worker - Worker 6b378fbc-cbcd-4ba4-aed8-9d8ad247eb2f for storm shell-metrics-tester-1-3 on 2e862cd2-ccaf-48ac-820e-6c5a714e9bc8:1024 has finished loading

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [na:1.7.0_65]

org.apache.zookeeper.server.ServerCnxn$EndOfStreamException: Unable to read additional data from client sessionid 0x14801d52e3d0003, likely client has

fields.summary: Storm build failures due to metrics_test.clj

comments.body:
[~revans2] [~dagit]  [~xiaokang] This issue is caused by non-zero exit in ShellBolt.die
https://github.com/apache/incubator-storm/blob/master/storm-core/src/jvm/backtype/storm/task/ShellBolt.java#L302
easiest fix is to make System.exit(0) although it indicates the process exited without any error.

GitHub user harshach opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/incubator-storm/pull/240

    STORM-466. Strom build failures due to metrics_test.clj.

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/harshach/incubator-storm STORM-466

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/incubator-storm/pull/240.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #240
    
----
commit 6970fef0fe17998804bb87263ab765e0400a2596
Author: Sriharsha Chintalapani <mail@harsha.io>
Date:   2014-08-23T21:13:24Z

    STORM-466. Strom build failures due to metrics_test.clj.

----

Github user xiaokang commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/incubator-storm/pull/240#issuecomment-53178864
  
    hi @harshach , this problem is related to #223 . Chould you have a look at it whether it fix this problem?

Github user harshach commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/incubator-storm/pull/240#issuecomment-53523494
  
    closing this PR as this issue is fixed in another JIRA

Github user harshach closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/incubator-storm/pull/240
